/* PostpaidSaleMapper.getPostpaidSaleList */ SELECT tsshm.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tsshm.MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tsshm.SALE_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SALE_DATE, tsshm.POS_NO, tsshm.BILL_NO, tsdmp.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM, tsdmp.TOT_SALE_QTY, tsdmp.REAL_SALE_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_MEMBR tsshm, TB_SL_DAILY_MEMBR_PROD tsdmp, TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm, TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp WHERE 1=1 AND tsshm.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tsshm.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND tsshm.MEMBR_NO LIKE '%'||#{membrNo}||'%'
AND tmm.MEMBR_NM LIKE '%'||#{membrNm}||'%'
AND tsshm.POS_NO = '99'
AND tsshm.POS_NO <> '99'
-- 미진행
AND tsdmp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tsshm.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tsdmp.HQ_BRAND_CD = tsshm.HQ_BRAND_CD AND tsdmp.STORE_CD = tsshm.STORE_CD AND tsdmp.SALE_DATE = tsshm.SALE_DATE AND tsdmp.MEMBR_NO = tsshm.MEMBR_NO AND tms.STORE_CD = tsshm.STORE_CD AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND tmm.MEMBR_NO = tsshm.MEMBR_NO AND tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD = tsdmp.HQ_BRAND_CD AND tmp.STORE_CD = tsdmp.STORE_CD AND tmp.PROD_CD = tsdmp.PROD_CD ORDER BY tsshm.STORE_CD, tsshm.MEMBR_NO
